props.text: Calculate Motor Efficiency for Selected Time Range

config.expression: concat(dateFormat({.../PowerData/PowerChart.props.config.startDate},"MMM d, yy h:mm:ss a"), "-", dateFormat({.../PowerData/PowerChart.props.config.endDate},"MMM d, yy h:mm:ss a"))
concat(dateFormat({.../PowerData/PowerChart.props.config.rangeStartDate},"MMM d, yy h:mm:ss a"), "-", dateFormat({.../PowerData/PowerChart.props.config.rangeEndDate},"MMM d, yy h:mm:ss a"))
